main event: A report from Project Blue Book documents a UFO sighting in Atlanta, Georgia in December 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as round, larger than a star, with a bluish halo and ruby red color., The observation lasted for 10 minutes, with the object observed moving downward., Multiple documents indicated a possible identification as a star or balloon., There were multiple witnesses including a Captain in the USAF., Visibility and difficulties in estimating size, speed, and altitude made identification challenging.
sighted object: one round object with bluish halo and ruby red color
